lead_paragraph: Washington Capitals defenseman Brooks Orpik was suspended three games for his late hit to the head of Pittsburgh Penguins defenseman Olli Maatta.

headline.print_headline: Capitals' Orpik Suspended 3 Games for Hit on Maatta
headline.main: Capitals' Orpik Suspended 3 Games for Hit on Maatta
